description:
The app that gives it full control over everything to do with energy.

Get a simple overview of the expected energy price, as well as useful advice to reduce your electricity bill. Make smart energy choices and cut costs by comparing energy prices hour by hour. Get daily notification with the summary of tomorrows prices.

Here you get everything you need in one place:

Electricity price
- Get a full overview of the electricity price, hour by hour. You will get an overview of the energy prices today and tomorrow, as well as find historical electricity prices. Reduce your electricity bill by avoiding the most expensive hours of the day and using electricity when it is cheapest. The spot price varies from hour to hour and is governed by the electricity exchange Nord Pool.

Notifications
- Get notifications when you should avoid using a lot of energy. You can choose to receive a daily notification when the spot price is the cheapest and most expensive during the day.

Switch between price areas
- Get a full overview of energy prices in the Nordics.
releaseNotes:
Exciting Updates from Elekt! New Features Await You!

We're thrilled to announce our latest update, v2.2.0! This isn't just any update – it's packed with numerous new features and improvements to enhance your experience with Elekt.

Here's what's new and improved:

Exciting new features:


- In-App Purchases: Elekt App now offers a subscription page and in-app payments - a fantastic addition for our users!
- Price Clarity: We've fixed mixed price areas during onboarding, ensuring a clearer understanding of costs.
- Spot Prices Notification: Now get tomorrow’s spot prices directly through push notifications.
- User Experience Improvement: We’ve made improvements to the personal information country picker for a smoother user experience.
- Dark Mode: Choose your preference with the Dark Mode Toggle on the MyProfile page!
- Sleek Postcode Selector: Navigate through our redesigned Postcode Selector for a better, more intuitive experience.
- Animated Splash Screen: Enjoy a delightful visual treat with our new, animated splash screen. Each time you launch the Elekt App, be greeted with a sleek, smooth, and electrifying animation. A joy to kick-start your app journey!


Improvements & fixes:


- Dark Theme Adjustments: We fixed the dark theme adjustments for a better visual experience.
- Bug Fixes: Say goodbye to pesky bugs in the dropdown and location screens – they've been squashed!
- Enhanced Subscription: Experience a more robust subscription experience with improved error handling.

The future at Elekt is here, and we're sure you're going to love it! As always, we welcome and appreciate your feedback as it fuels our continuous improvements and innovation.

Stay tuned - stay electrified!
